title: Le Pain Quotidien - Les Halles
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Organic, Mediterranean, Take-out, Bakery, European, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. International restaurant chain featuring artisan bakery and communal table. Menu includes several ovo-lacto vegetarian dishes as well as vegan ones. This branch is inside the Forum des Halles.
